haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Kmdr Patrik Schorner
Ltn Detlef Schwarzer
Ltn Augustus Kass
Fw Ruprecht Hess

 The mission was flown from Balatre aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 09/10/1916 near Hattencourt.
A F.E.2b of No 8 Squadron RFC was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 16b.
Elvis Herleston was seriously wounded.
Rupert Eston was not injured.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Albatros D.II.

On 09/10/1916 near Hattencourt.
A F.E.2b of No 8 Squadron RFC was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 16b.
Francis Bettsthorne was lightly wounded.
Elbert Cuddon was not injured.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Albatros D.II.

On 09/10/1916 near La Tergette.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.112 was brought down by Nikolaus Schildhauer of Jasta 16b.
Lt Cyprien Lafarge was killed in action.
Nikolaus Schildhauer was  flying a Albatros D.II.

On 09/10/1916 near Bully-les-Mines.
A F.E.2b of No 16 Squadron RFC was brought down by Viktor Schiller of Jasta 16b.
Maj Gifford Engleford was killed in action.
Cpt Walter Serche was killed in action.
Viktor Schiller was  flying a Albatros D.II.


Pilots lost were: 
    Ltn Augustus Kass: Killed in Action
